content.question: Which of the following best describes the historical situation in which the amendment was proposed?

choices.label: The Anti-Federalists sought to add a bill of rights to the Constitution.
The federal government sought to acquire more western land in North America.
The United States sought to forcibly remove American Indians from their homelands.
The Constitutional Convention sought to establish the separation of powers between branches of government.

content.answer: The federal government sought to acquire more western land in North America.
